description.value: Select one weapon with which you are proficient. You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{Weapon Focus} with that weapon. At 8th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.TbOPtIL8Fv8obXtP]{Improved Critical} with that weapon. At 12th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.IER2MzJrjSvxMlNS]{Greater Weapon Focus} with that weapon. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.
